div.p: Our k-5 program is dedicated to creating a strong starting point for students to develop life-long habits for success.
JR High school is key for instilling our students with the knowledge and endurance to understand, implement, and complete everyday challenges in the real world.
Our high school program works with our students to prepare them for their future careers and or continued education (college).

div.p: Benjamin's community is best described as a neighborhood where everyone looks after each other.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid wh-reset-padding-top-on-mobile vc_custom_1545066209757 vc_row-has-fill

div.p: Benjamin ISD is a K-12 school dedicated to excellence.
From our outstanding athletics programs to our Technology programs and everything in between.
Our schools offer excellent opportunities for students as they prepare for their future.

div.class: wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInLeft fadeInLeft wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-3
wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn fadeIn wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-3

div.p:
With flowing tail and flying mane,
Wide nostrils never stretched by pain,
Mouth bloodless to bit or rein,
And feet that iron never shod,
And flanks unscar'd by spur or rod,
A thousand horses - the wild - the free -
Like waves that follow o'er the sea,
Came thickly thundering on.
- Lord Byron
